solution.text:
The three consecutive multiples of _{j}_ are _{j}_x, _{j}_(x+1), _{j}_(x+2)
It is given that their sum is _{{12*j}}_
Therefore, _{j}_x + _{j}_(x+1) + _{j}_(x+2) = _{{12*j}}_
_{{3*j}}_x + _{j}_ + _{{2*j}}_ = _{{12*j}}_
\(\Rightarrow\) _{{3*j}}_x + _{{3*j}}_ = _{{12*j}}_
\(\Rightarrow\) _{{3*j}}_x = _{{12*j}}_ - _{{3*j}}_ = _{{9*j}}_
\(\Rightarrow\) _{{3*j}}_x = _{{9*j}}_
Divide both sides by _{{3*j}}_
\(\Rightarrow\) x=3
